articles.body: American technology companies are no strangers to antitrust challenges by European regulators, but the cost has tended to be measured in money and time, not business practices.
articles.summary: American technology companies are no strangers to antitrust challenges by European regulators, but the cost has tended to be measured in money and time, not business practices.
articles.title: Daily Report: Joining American Peers, Google Gets Caught in Europe’s Cross Hairs

articles.body: The European Union is accusing Google of abusing its dominance, and Microsoft has links with the three initial complainants that sparked the antitrust investigation.
articles.summary: The European Union is accusing Google of abusing its dominance, and Microsoft has links with the three initial complainants that sparked the antitrust investigation.
articles.title: Microsoft, Once an Antitrust Target, Is Now Google’s Regulatory Scold
